title: Advertisement Details For AdCloud Search

xdm:creativeID.title: creative id
xdm:creativeID.description: Unique identifier for the creative which this event is associated with.

xdm:keywordID.title: keyword id
xdm:keywordID.description: Unique identifier for the keyword that surfer used to search , which triggered this click event

xdm:audienceID.title: audience id
xdm:audienceID.description: Unique identifier for the audience segment for which the ad is targeted

xdm:adGroupID.title: adGroup id
xdm:adGroupID.description: Unique identifier for the adGroup which ad is displayed and triggered this click event

xdm:campaignID.title: campaign id
xdm:campaignID.description: Unique identifier for the campaign that belongs to the current displayed advertisement which triggers this click event

xdm:network.title: network
xdm:network.description: Current click event came from a search advertisement or content advertisement

meta:enum.search: Ad is displayed in Search Network
meta:enum.content: Ad is displayed in Content Network

xdm:matchType.title: matchType
xdm:matchType.description: To check for current displayed advertisement what kind of match is done to match keyword
